article_title: 'This war must stop now,' says Starmer after three Britons killed.
sentence: Labour  leader  Sir  Keir  Starmer  says  the  deaths  of  three  British  aid  workers,  killed  in  last  night's  Israeli  air  strike  in  Gaza  ,  are  "outrageous  and  unacceptable".

article_title: 'This war must stop now,' says Starmer after three Britons killed.
sentence: "Far  too  many  innocent  people  have  died  in  this  conflict  and  more  than  a  million  are  facing  starvation.  "
